title: Star Wars: Galactic BattleGrounds + Expansioin [Windows-Linux] [
description:
Hi again!
Here is one gift to all retro gamers there from the glorious days of our childhood.

Containing
1. Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds is a real-time strategy computer game set in the Star Wars universe.

2. Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds Clone Campaigns is an expansion pack that was released shortly after the theatrical release of Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones. It introduced two more playable factions and campaigns: that of the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Republic. The Clone Campaigns also added more units, such as the Decimator and the Air Cruiser, support for movable power supplies, and more.

No need to install. 

Windows Users:

Decompress the file. Open the GAME folder. Double Click on battlegrounds.exe or battlegrounds_x1.exe to play. 

Linux Users:

I hope you have that magnificent WINE installed. Open the folder, right click on battlegrounds.exe or battlegrounds_x1.exe and select "open with WINE Windows Program Loader"


Like my every release, all the games will work fine in Linux. Tested in Ubuntu 14.10 & Windows XP. 

Forget not to
1. say thanks
2. more importantly, seed after you finish downloading
